i18nHelper Maven Mojo
Last Published: 2012-04-11  | Version: 0.1.2-SNAPSHOT
i18nHelper Maven Mojo
Parent Project
  • i18nHelper Maven Mojo Parent
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

i18nHelper:translate

Full name:

com.summit:i18nHelper:0.1.2-SNAPSHOT:translate

Description:

This goal uses the Google Translation API to translate a document generated from the pull goal.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-sources.
  • Requires that Maven runs in online mode.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
defaultLocale String - What is the base locale in your resource bundles
Default value is: en.
fileToTranslate File - The generated file from the pull goal.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/i18nHelper.properties.
forceTranslation boolean - Force the translation even if one is provided
Default value is: false.
googleApiKey String - Google API Key, you have to provide this yourself...
httpReferrer URL - Referrer for the call to google's api.
Default value is: http://www.summitsystemsinc.com.
languageCode String - (no description)
languageCodes List - Languages codes to include in the pull, these will be added to the generated file. File output will be a java properties file
outputDirectory File - Location of the file.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}.
outputFileName String - Output File name.
Default value is: i18nHelper-translated.properties.
workers int - Number of worker threads to use.
Default value is: 10.

Parameter Details

defaultLocale:

What is the base locale in your resource bundles
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: en

fileToTranslate:

The generated file from the pull goal.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${i18nHelper.translateIn}
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/i18nHelper.properties

forceTranslation:

Force the translation even if one is provided
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${i18nHelper.forceTranslate}
  • Default: false

googleApiKey:

Google API Key, you have to provide this yourself...
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${translate.googleApiKey}

httpReferrer:

Referrer for the call to google's api.
  • Type: java.net.URL
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${translate.referrer}
  • Default: http://www.summitsystemsinc.com

languageCode:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

languageCodes:

Languages codes to include in the pull, these will be added to the generated file. File output will be a java properties file
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

outputDirectory:

Location of the file.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}

outputFileName:

Output File name.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${i18nHelper.translateOut}
  • Default: i18nHelper-translated.properties

workers:

Number of worker threads to use.
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${translate.workers}
  • Default: 10
